 2002-07962002-05-090,  ,  RESOURCES,  ,  , 
PrecisOrder authorizing Compensation Specialists and Human Resources Advisors employed by the NATIONAL ENERGY BOARD to administer oaths and to take and receive affidavits, declarations and solemn affirmations, for any of the purposes of the Public Service Employment Act or any regulations made thereunder.
